columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp when the log entry was created in AWS Network Firewall.

columns.name: FirewallName
columns.description: The name of the AWS Network Firewall instance generating the log.

columns.name: AvailabilityZone
columns.description: The AWS Availability Zone where the firewall instance is located.

columns.name: EventTimestamp
columns.description: The epoch timestamp of when the event occurred.

columns.name: SrcIp
columns.description: The source IP address of the packet that triggered the event.

columns.name: SrcPort
columns.description: The source port from which the packet originated.

columns.name: DestIp
columns.description: The destination IP address of the packet.

columns.name: DestPort
columns.description: The destination port to which the packet was sent.

columns.name: Sni
columns.description: The Server Name Indication (SNI) from TLS traffic.

columns.name: LeafCertificateFingerprint
columns.description: The SHA-256 fingerprint of the leaf certificate observed in the TLS handshake.

columns.name: Status
columns.description: The status of the TLS inspection event (e.g., success, failure).

columns.name: Action
columns.description: The action taken by the firewall (e.g., allowed, dropped, inspected).

columns.name: ErrorMessage
columns.description: Any error message associated with the event, if applicable.
